name: Lizard Wizard
overview: Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to save the people trapped in the deadly planet of Zyfus before the massive dragon lizards devour them to create their fire. In the amazing Lizard Wizard you must fly around the levels, blast the rocks that are spewed out of the volcano at the bottom of the screen to save the people and lead them towards and out of the doors that await so they can escape the planet to safety.
